get.summary: Get all permissions with pagination.by default it taken 50 record for every request. you can do search ?search=mysearch in this endpoint

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: number of page for retrieve data as pagination

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: parameter to for per page data with be retrieve

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: parameter to for search something similar

current_page.description: showing current page of data pagination

last_page.description: showing the last page of pagination

per_page.description: showing item display for every request

total.description: showing all total of record according the query

post.summary: Give permission (spatie) to user. so user will have access to do something belonging to given permissions

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: user_id of user to be granted access

post.summary: Revoke permission (spatie) from user. so user will have no access to do something belonging to permissions

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: user_id of user to be granted access
